Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Link

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.model.Link
  • public class Link
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a link between two adjacent squares on the GameBoard.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Link​(Square firstSquare, Square secondSquare, LinkType type)
      Constructor of a link between two squares.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Cardinal getDirectionFromSquare​(Square origin)
      Given an "origin" square, return the direction of this link starting from the origin and going to the other square.
      Square getFirstSquare()
      Get the first endpoint of this link.
      Square getOtherSquare​(Square origin)
      Given an "origin" square, return the other square in this link.
      Square getSecondSquare()
      Get the second endpoint of this link.
      LinkType getType()
      Get the type of the link.
      boolean isDoor()
      Check if this link connects two squares that share a door.
      boolean isSameRoom()
      Check if this link connects two squares in the same room.
      boolean isWall()
      Check if this link connects two squares that share a wall.

    • Method Detail

      • isWall

        public boolean isWall()
        Check if this link connects two squares that share a wall.
        Returns:
        True if link has type "WALL", otherwise false.

      • isDoor

        public boolean isDoor()
        Check if this link connects two squares that share a door.
        Returns:
        True if link has type "DOOR", otherwise false.

      • isSameRoom

        public boolean isSameRoom()
        Check if this link connects two squares in the same room.
        Returns:
        True if link has type "SAME_ROOM", otherwise false.

        public Square getOtherSquare​(Square origin)

      • getDirectionFromSquare

        public Cardinal getDirectionFromSquare​(Square origin)
        Given an "origin" square, return the direction of this link starting from the origin and going to the other square.
        Parameters:
        origin - Square to be used to calculate the direction.
        Returns:
        The direction of the link
